about_the_game:
A point-and-click time-management game where cats rule and laundry is big business. Laundrocorp's cattorneys are pressuring your fledgling laundromat to fold. Manage your hectic laundry business, unlock customers, and level up your cat to defeat Laundrocorp and bring honor back to your family.



Early Feedback for Laundry Simulator from Seattle Indies Expo 2021 judges:
“Love, love, love it!”
“Such a cute, interesting, and surprisingly addicting game”
“Beautifully paced, nicely balanced with just the right amount of ramp up and anxiety to keep me guessing”

Cat Professions


Level up your cat, Snowball, into an expert accattant, cattorney, or even just a better cat. Use accattant skills to earn money faster, cattorney skills to shield against lawsuits and fines, and cat skills for increasing customer patience.

Unlockable Customers


Unlock unique customer types, and discover their attributes and special abilities. For some, perfectly washed and folded laundry delivered quickly will mean positive buffs. For others, a single mistake could ruin your day. Learn which customers you can’t afford to ignore, which will help you out if treated right, and how to strategically stack buffs.

Store Upgrades


Buy more and better machines to do even more laundry. Purchase cat toys to distract your cat from sleeping on laundry, or buy an industrial de-linter to deal with the naptime shedding.

Story Rich

You are the great-grandchild to the late Landon Washerman, laundry legend. Before he grew ill, no one could beat Landon. Learn about your family past, discover hidden lore, and maybe even find out how Landon became ill in the first place...

Features

  • Cattorney, accattant, and cat skill trees
  • Unlockable customers with special abilities
  • Store upgrades
  • Cattorney battles
  • Laundry-themed periodical with tips and tricks
  • Deep history with family secrets
  • Pettable cat!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB; OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB; OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Laundry Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB; OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A point-and-click time-management game where cats rule. Manage your hectic laundromat and get your cat through law school to defeat Laundrocorp.
